person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Two ship loaded in Thunder Bay , one waited and seven were due .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| Two |
| one |
| seven |

Note: In this paragraph, "Two", "one", and "seven" are mentioned as the number of ships, so they are considered as "Person" entities in this context.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| Two |
| one |

Note: In this paragraph, "Two" and "one" are mentioned as the number of ships, so they are considered as "Person" entities in this context. "Seven" is not mentioned in the paragraph, so it is not included in the table.
